The New Wave Of FinTech: The End Of Banking [Video]

Dec 11, 2017
1 minute read

Mike Sigal, an entrepreneur, early-stage investor & Partner at 500 Startups, presents his views on the wave of financial technology startups that facilitate long-term changes in the financial services industry. Whether newcomers gain long-term ground or not, they set new standards in the industry. They show customers the way that the things could work, faster, easier, and more conveniently.
